price: 105. Mitangelama bino mikapo mia ngai te, kasi bozalaki kondimela yango te?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam takun āyātī tut'lā ʿalaykum fakuntum bihā tukadhibūna
